thread.title: HENDRICKS/WILLARD DALE
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by HENDRICKS/WILLARD DALE

author: HENDRICKS/WILLARD DALE
title: HENDRICKS/WILLARD DALE
text: Amber was the ASAP agent working with me. I had numerous questions about air fares because of various options my group were considering. Although I probably would have rolled my eyes at the many "what ifs" I asked, Amber was cool, efficient and encouraging throughout. Don't remember better customer services anywhere.
